LoyaltyTierBenefit.name: LoyaltyTierBenefit
LoyaltyTierBenefit.description: A junction object that associates the loyalty benefits with the loyalty program tiers.

BenefitId.description: Required. Benefit associated with the loyalty tier benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyTierId.description: Tier associated with the loyalty benefit.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty tier benefit.
